events.message: I recently purchased a pair of shoes but they don't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or an exchange for another size.
The issue reported involves a request for a refund or exchange due to size mismatch with the shoes purchased.
The case has been assigned to the refunds team to assist with your request for a return or exchange.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the shoes didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the shoes have been used or if they are still in their original packaging?
My order number is 45327891. The shoes are brand new and still in the original packaging; I haven’t worn them yet.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund immediately or send you a replacement in a different size, whichever you prefer.
I would like to exchange them for a size 9, please. That would be great, thanks for your help.
The exchange request for size 9 has been processed. You will receive a shipping label shortly, and the new shoes will be sent once we receive the return.
Just checking in to make sure you have received the replacement shoes in size 9 and that everything meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the new shoes yesterday and they fit perfectly. Thank you very much for the quick and smooth exchange process.
We are glad everything worked out well. Closing your case now, and thanks for choosing our store!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund and exchange experience.
